ðŸ“– Summary: WattWise is a command-line tool for monitoring power usage from smart plugs. It supports direct connection to TP-Link Kasa plugs or integration with Home Assistant, providing real-time power data with color-coded displays and historical charts. The tool offers a simple interface for monitoring wattage and current, making it easy to track energy consumption.
